name: New Targer 3: Animal Hunter Sn
description:
New Targer 3: Animal Hunter Sniper is a hunting simulation game which simulates your hunting and shooting skills in a 3D safari jungle environment. In this Safari Wild Hunter action games we use different types of sniper to target wild animals also shooting the extreme targets in our new deer hunting games. Graphics are best of character making crazy environment, realistic control and real animals sound and voices in this Games.
• amazing scary environment
• fantastic thrilling gun aim
• smooth controls
• interesting game play
• real graphics of game
• entertaining sound music
• scary animal voices
• walking and running animal shoot
